item.title: Why Is America Sending Weapons To India - Vox
item.description: #internetContent #news #politic Article link: https://www.vox.com/world-politics/2023/6/23/23770369/why-us-selling-india-so-many-weapons-drones-jet-engines Content The United States is selling India a record number of weapons, including jets, drones, and cyber capabilities.
